channel.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
channel.description:
When I log in my server I want it to say - "The Owner, Damien, Has logged in!"
How can I do this?

item.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“damienbreadon, post:1, topic:450692”]When I log in my server I want it to say - “The Owner, Damien, Has logged in!”

How can I do this?[/quote]

Well you’re server probably will already have a welcome message like “Welcome to Damienscape” or something.
Underneath that you need to add that when you log in a message will be yelled.
Like dan almost gave you the correct code. I think you should be able to figure it out now.

Read full topic

item.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Mario_PvP Mario PvP
item.description:
@Mario_PvP wrote:

Don’t just tell him the welcome message, but the packet?

its in void initialize

Read full topic

item.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @thewindman78 thewindman78
item.description:
@thewindman78 wrote:

put it with your server welcome message -_-

Read full topic

item.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @damienbreadon damienbreadon
item.description:
@damienbreadon wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:2, topic:450692”]Put this into the correct place in client.java

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Damien")) { { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Owner, Damien, Has logged in!"; }

Im not going to tell you where to put it because I want you to learn for further on into the future :D[/quote]

If you tell me where then I’ll know for the future? Can anyone else help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Log-in announcement [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Put this into the correct place in client.java

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Damien")) { { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "The Owner, Damien, Has logged in!"; }

Im not going to tell you where to put it because I want you to learn for further on into the future

Read full topic
